hero.title: Design Your Value Proposition with
hero.description: D'AI Vinci helps you structure, visualize, and refine your business strategy simply and effectively. Use analysis tools like Business Model Canvas, Value Proposition Canvas, SWOT, PESTEL, and more to create a solid approach that drives your business forward.

features.title: D'AI Vinci Features
features.description: D'AI Vinci's powerful tools are designed to help you structure and optimize every aspect of your business strategy. From planning to presentation, each feature is designed to make the process simple and effective.

aiAssistant.title: AI Assistant
aiAssistant.description: Receive real-time recommendations and analysis to help strengthen your value proposition with the support of our AI assistant.

pdfExport.title: PDF Export
pdfExport.description: Download your strategy models in PDF format to easily share with your team and stakeholders.

exampleLibrary.title: Example Library
exampleLibrary.description: Access examples of strategic Canvases based on successful companies to inspire and guide your own strategies.

multipleCanvases.title: Multiple Canvases
multipleCanvases.description: Easily create and customize Business Model Canvas, Value Proposition, SWOT, PESTEL, and Empathy Map.

testimonials.title: What Our Users Say About D'AI Vinci
testimonials.description: Discover how D'AI Vinci has transformed business strategy for companies worldwide. Our users' experience speaks to the simplicity and effectiveness the application brings to their business planning and execution.

sarah.quote: This app has revolutionized how we approach our value proposition. It's intuitive and powerful, an essential tool for any strategist.

michael.quote: The visual perspective of this tool helped us identify critical points in our offering that we didn't even know existed.

pricing.title: D'AI Vinci Subscription Plans
pricing.description: Choose the plan that best fits your needs and start optimizing your business strategy with D'AI Vinci.

featureComparison.title: Plan Feature Comparison
featureComparison.description: Compare our plan options to find the one that best suits your team's needs and business projects.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions about D'AI Vinci

valueProposition.question: What is a Value Proposition Canvas?
valueProposition.answer: It's a tool that helps position your product or service around customer needs and values. It facilitates designing products and services that customers really want.

difference.question: How is D'AI Vinci different from other business planning tools?
difference.answer: D'AI Vinci brings the Value Proposition Canvas and other strategic models to life with interactive features and AI-driven analysis, offering a more dynamic and user-friendly experience.

multipleProjects.question: Can I use D'AI Vinci for multiple projects?
multipleProjects.answer: Yes, depending on the plan you choose, you can manage several projects within the application, allowing you to design and compare value propositions for different customer segments.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Strategy?
cta.description: Start your free trial and take your business planning to the next level with D'AI Vinci.
